Ecclesiastes__07.4__Anger: : That is, correction, or just wrath and zeal against evil.
Ecclesiastes__07.17__Over just: : Viz., By an excessive rigour in censuring the ways of God in bearing with the wicked.
Ecclesiastes__07.18__Be not overmuch wicked: : That is, lest by the greatness of your sin you leave no room for mercy.
Ecclesiastes__07.30__Of the word: : That is, of this obscure and difficult matter.
